wikipedia_page.main: Air Vice-Marshal Carl William Dixon,  is a retired senior commander of the Royal Air Force who served as Commander of Joint Helicopter Command from 2011 to 2014.

response: His youngest daughter Lauren Dixon is most publicly known for her role as Stevie Lake on the 2008 series reboot of The Saddle Club. Carl Dixon wrote the song "Just Because" for The Saddle Club Season 3 CD "Best Friends".
* Air Vice-Marshal Carl Dixon, Commander from 2011–14 of the Joint Helicopter Command, Station Commander from 2002–04 of RAF Benson
